info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:20PM MDT until June 03 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Quay County in east central New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 520 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Jon, or 19 miles east of Tucumcari, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Jon, Glenrio and Bard. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 347 and 373. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
